title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 16.52 - Electrical hazards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 16.52 - Electrical hazards

State Regulations
(a) All radiation equipment, except equipment used solely in research and development, installed in a radiation installation shall, where applicable, be listed by the Underwriters Laboratories Inc., or shall comply with the National Electrical Code of the National Fire Protection Association or an equivalent safety standard. (b) Existing equipment employing uninsulated or bare overhead conductors moved to a new location or registered as a new installation under section
16.50
of this Part shall be certified as being free of electrical hazards. (c) Certification by a duly constituted local authority that the installation is free of electrical hazards shall be acceptable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
16.52

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
